Articles.Content:
Would it be a big problem to recompile the Tech Tree Editor to allow loading Yonge Tech tree with . instead of , for scale.

If in the EngTechTree i put:

    scale = 0,6

instead of:

    scale = 0.6

..and save, then the KSP will not load it. And given comma is used in other places while dot is used only in scale, it would be a lot easier to make editor read dot than vice versa. Also careful when saving the tree.

Edit: I will just later do a text replace, but expect an update from me regarding ETT Today or tomorrow where I will add ALL mods from my list

**Edited <time datetime="2016-06-09T09:27:45Z" title="06/09/2016 09:27  AM" data-short="8 yr">June 9, 2016</time> by Grunf911**

Yay, created my first Git pull request, adding Cormorant Aeronology pack. Let me know if i did it correctly, and please let me know when it is released

I will be adding more for sure :-)

Ok, so this is my first post, so be easy on me ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

First of all, love this tech tree and appreciate everyone who works on it to make it better!!

What got me here is that I was having an issue where the communotron 16 wasn't showing up in the VAB even though I have it unlocked in the tree and was on a few of my rockets.  It might be related to the fact that I had installed some mod parts that were used on existing rockets and then decided to remove those mods later.  This took me down a few rabbit holes last night to try and figure out what was going on, but here's one of the holes I went down.

I was a bit curious how the EngTechTree.cfg file works, so I downloaded the latest version from git and started poking around in it.  While looking around, I noticed in a few of the nodes, that there were parts with duplicate names.  This got me to thinking how many parts are duplicated in the tree.  Would having duplicate part names cause issues to where parts would be missing in the VAB?

Here's the list of parts along with how many times they are duplicated.

       9 |                     part = FNFissionFusionCatReactorMk1

       7 |                     part = mk3Cockpit\_Airliner

       5 |                     part = i\_4m\_cockpit\_isp

**Edited <time datetime="2016-06-10T15:03:09Z" title="06/10/2016 03:03  PM" data-short="8 yr">June 10, 2016</time> by Grunf911**

Hello, just wondering why the USI Karibou Hub [KER\_Hub] is on the Plasma Propulsion [plasmaPropulsion] Node?

IMHO I think it should go ether on the "Simple LEM" or on "Logistics and Landing Modules" nodes. 

Thnx for your work on this mod!

I don't know if I'm the only one who thinks that the latest **ETT** is very messy looking. I'm not a modder by no means and I really don't mean to complain, however I really love this game and play it whenever I have free time, but I just keep running into problems with some of the mods and can't make any progress in the game.

First let me apologize to, I'm sorry if I get his name incorrect; RoverDude. I think that's his name, for complaining to him for one of the reactors that does not work at all. By the way I think I found out why, as it is going to be removed at some point.

Anyway, before the release of the latest KSP; I had a BIG problem with the game crashing a lot. Now that it has been solved, some of the mods are all goofy. Anything form sinking in to the ground, exploding on contact, not showing up in VAB after unlocking in R&D to not working at all.

Sorry, got a little long winded.

I just want to know if there will ever be a new Firespitter and a ETT release that will work? As these two mode are the ones having problems. some of the parts in firespitter still sinks into the ground and ETT won't give me the parts that I work so hard to unlock. The latest ETT seems to give me the parts, however, R&D is so messy I can't make heads or tails out of it. Also, the editor being released with it, I would think is for modder. As to the former I am not. So the new ETT is useless to me. OH, I all most forgot. I would really like to pimp my rover, so somebody PLEASE fix the Fast corp wheels.

Any feed back from the modders of the modes in question would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you.

So looks like nobody wants to make HGR / HGR Redux compatibility?

It's a small but really great pack, not only because it has 1,875m parts but also very fine made and unique stuff (all stock-a-like):

Vostok, Gemini, Soyuz (LES, spaceship and boosters), inline 0,625m chute, 0,625m LES., nice 2 manned lander can, 3 way RCS trusters

It's a real gem, just try it and you'll want it in your tree ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")

hi,

ive found an compatibility bug with this mod and Kerbal Construction Time.

bug: i cant research the "Field Science" (that one with wheels) anytime when the resarch finished, the game crashes ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(")

nope ive lots of mods but on this resarch are only some <abbr title="Kerbal Attachment System (mod)">KAS</abbr> items too.
Quick update.  I will be back this weekend to answer your questions and try to fix problems.  Thanks for your patience.

I haven't even tried it in 1.1.3 yet.  I was foiled this weekend and will try again next weekend.  Let me know if it doesn't work and I will recompile Yonge's again and get a patch out ASAP.
I just fired up 1.1.3 and didn't see any problems with ETT. I didn't research anything, but at least the tree is displayed ok.
This is the best tech tree I have seen, thank you for making it. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

It wont let me research field science even though I have heavy landing, is there some way around this? ![unknown.png](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/183213702659440640/199101334786539521/unknown.png)
Is there a way to skip empty nodes that would have parts from mods you aren't using in them?

> 
> 
> 3 hours ago, Errol said:
> 
> 
> Is there a way to skip empty nodes that would have parts from mods you aren't using in them?
> 

That would be [this](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/118305-11x-hide-empty-tech-tree-nodes-for-community-tech-tree-derivatives-v04/) mod.

How to install this in 1.1.3 now when it requires YongeTech, which is compiled for 1.1.2? <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr> will not allow to install and I do not see any link here to download manually...

Regards,  

Garagoth.

> 
> 
> On 7/20/2016 at 2:35 AM, Garagoth said:
> 
> 
> How to install this in 1.1.3 now when it requires YongeTech, which is compiled for 1.1.2? <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)"><abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr></abbr> will not allow to install and I do not see any link here to download manually...
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Regards,  
> 
> Garagoth.

Ah... That would be a problem.  Let me update Yonge's Mod.  Sorry.  Didn't notice till now.

> 
> 
> 6 hours ago, Probus said:
> 
> 
> Ah... That would be a problem.  Let me update Yonge's Mod.  Sorry.  Didn't notice till now.
> 

New "YongeTech Tech Trees Plugin Revived" will track ETT version numbers and KSP version. <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr> users will need to uninstall any existing YongeTech Tech Tree Plugin to cross-grade. Available now!
This is a thing of pure beauty.  No more adding hundreds of sci just to feel like I'm "starting" the game right!  ::squee::

Did anybody ever write a Kerbalism config for the module upgrades?  These include the scrubber, manufacturing quality, and processor.  I'm going to try to write one tomorrow but would love to take an already completed one, however it's set up. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")
